general.title: AJ's Appliance Repair | Las Cruces, NM
general.description: Local, honest, and professional appliance repair in Las Cruces, NM. Serving Las Cruces & Surrounding Areas within a 60-mile radius.

hero.subtitle: Honest, punctual, and professional service right here in Las Cruces. We get your home running smoothly again.

services.title: Expert Repairs for Every Brand
services.description: Whether it's a vintage stove in Mesilla or a smart fridge in Sonoma Ranch, we have the tools and training to fix it.

items.title: Fridge & Freezer
items.description: We repair all major cooling appliances, including ice makers and chest freezers.

items.title: Washer & Dryer
items.description: From spinning issues to heating elements, we fix all clothes washer and dryer models.

items.title: Oven & Stovetop
items.description: Gas or electric. We fix igniters, temperature sensors, and glass cooktops.

items.title: Small Appliances
items.description: Dishwashers, small kitchen appliances, and more. Quality installation and repair.

about.title: Integrity, Fairness
about.description1: With over 5 years of experience, AJ's Appliance Repair, LLC is committed to excellence in every aspect of our business. We uphold a standard of integrity bound by fairness, honesty, and personal responsibility.
about.description2: Our distinction is the quality of service we bring to our customers. Accurate knowledge of our trade combined with ability is what makes us true professionals. Above all, we are watchful of our customers' interests and make their concerns the basis of our business!

serviceArea.title: Where We Work
serviceArea.description: Based in Las Cruces, we proudly serve homeowners and property managers within a 60-mile radius of Las Cruces, New Mexico.
serviceArea.noteText: Contact us! We travel up to 60 miles for your convenience.

items.text: "The gentleman who repaired my fridge was incredible. Very polite and handy, but also answer all my questions about its issues. Took his time to really make sure the fridge was working and appropriately fixed."
items.author: Carolina G.

items.text: "Responded quickly & communicated well. AJ diagnosed the problem quickly and was honest in his appraisal & work."
items.author: Mike D.

quote.title: Need a Repair?
quote.description: Don't let a broken appliance ruin your week. Fill out the form to get a free quote and schedule your repair.
